file.name: valid-ref-to-header-with-ref.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Sample Pet Store App
  description: This is a sample server for a pet store.
  version: 1.0.1

paths:
  /path:
    summary: an endpoint
    description: still an endpoint
    get:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data
      description: Updates a pet in the store with form data
      responses:
        '200':
          description: a response
          headers:
              header:
                $ref: "firstRefLevel/header.yaml"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /path: get: responses: 200: headers: header: resolve "firstRefLevel/header.yaml" reference: invalid header reference
